message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $22,000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it, which is a fair price considering its value to me.

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I can accept.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $16,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but $16,000 is still too high for me. I'm sticking to my offer of $10,000. I believe this price is fair considering the value of the product to both of us.
